alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 1:49PM CDT until May 05 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Hill, Navarro, Ellis, and Kaufman counties. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas as well as flooded low-water crossings and ponding water on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Terrell, Hillsboro, Kaufman, Mabank, Crandall, Palmer, Combine, Italy, Itasca, Talty, Seven Points, Kemp, Maypearl, Bardwell, Grays Prairie, Alma, Cottonwood and Carl`s Corner.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
